OOC: How many bots do I have coming to rescue me? I just got a hand 
out from Arcangel... I'm confused.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, TrikeJacob@n... wrote:
> "What do you mean?" Airraptor asked, "I just opened your stasis pod 
for you. So you can get out."
> nbwrpg@egroups.com wrote:
> >
> > "Yes. I am. I the lieutenant of the Cybertron Special Forces. Is 
> > there any way you can get me outta here?"
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, TrikeJacob@n... wrote:
> > > Airraptor was on potrole through the air when he noticed a 
stasis 
> > pod on the ground and decided to check on it. 
> > > He glided down to the pod and ordered the pod to open. He 
looked 
> > inside and saw a female bot. 
> > > "Greetings," he said, "My name is Airraptor. I am a Maximal 
> > dinobot. Are you a Maximal?"
> > > nbwrpg@egroups.com wrote:
> > > >
> > > > Jagris waited patiently, listening to the hiss of static 
coming 
> > from 
> > > > her comlink. If she was back on Cybertron, none of this would 
be 
> > > > happening. Didn't anyone know these pods had a limited air 
> > supply? 
> > > > She'd go offline soon if someone didn't come. 
> > > > 
> > > > "This is Lieutenant Jagris of the Cybertron Special Forces... 
> > somebot 
> > > > answer me!!" 
> > > > 
> > > > *Did they forget? I can't bust outta here myself! Or...* 
> > > > 
> > > > Jagris put her feet to the lid of the pod, and pushed as hard 
as 
> > she 
> > > > could in such tight quarters.
> > > > 
> > > >
> > 
> >
